    <script type="text/javascript">
        // detect IE11 and add class 'ie11' to body
        function detectIE(){var n=window.navigator.userAgent,r=n.indexOf("Trident/");if(r>0){var e=n.indexOf("rv:");return parseInt(n.substring(e+3,n.indexOf(".",e)),10)}return!1}
        var IEversion=detectIE();IEversion!==!1&&11===IEversion&&(document.body.className+=" ie11");
    </script>

        <p class="js-hidden-success hide">

<script type="text/javascript">
    function updateCookie(hash, remove = false) {
        var setCookieUrl = 'http://comfy.ua/persistent_login/setcookie.php';
        var removePrint = remove ? 'true' : '';
        var urlParams = '?value=' + hash + '&remove=' + removePrint;

        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
        xhr.open('GET', setCookieUrl + urlParams, true);
        xhr.send();
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    updateCookie('', true);
</script><a data-gtm="Interactions-open-cart" data-require='["js-require-checkout"]' class="button button_cart button_cart_disabled"><span class="count">Корзина пуста</span></a>

                                    <li class="js-layer-content"
                                                                                data-filter-code="note_yader"
                                    >
                                        <ul class="layer__content-wrap">
                                            <li class="layer__content_all"
                                                                                                data-index="7"
                                            >
                                                <div class="name">
                                                    Количество ядер                                                                                                            <div class="layer__icon-popup"
                                                             data-toggle="popover"
                                                             data-trigger="hover"
                                                             data-content="Количество ядер процессора влияет на общую производительность. Процессоры с несколькими ядрами могут одновременно выполнять несколько потоков вычислений. Благодоря этому процессоры с большим количеством ядер обладают более высокой производительностью.">
                                                            <p class="popover">
                                                                <span class="arrow"></span>
                                                                Количество ядер процессора влияет на общую производительность. Процессоры с несколькими ядрами могут одновременно выполнять несколько потоков вычислений. Благодоря этому процессоры с большим количеством ядер обладают более высокой производительностью.                                                            </p>
                                                        </div>
                                                                                                    </div>
                                                
    <ul class="layer__content_all__item__attr ">
                    <li class="  "  data-gtm="Interactions-click-filter" data-gtm-filter="Количество ядер-2 ядра">

                        <span class="layer-title">
                            2 ядра                            <span class="close">×</span>
                        </span>
                    </a>
                                            </li>

                            4 ядра                            <span class="close">×</span>
                        </span>
                    </a>

<script type="text/x-jquery-tmpl" id="productFeaturesTemplate">
    <dl class="features__info">
        <dt class="title {{if colorize}}attribute-title-orange{{/if}}">
            {{html label }}:
        </dt>
        <dd class="value {{if is_url}}attribute-link{{/if}}">
            {{if ((value == 'Да') || (value == 'Да ') || (value == 'Есть') || (value == 'Есть ')
                  || (value == 'Да')
                  || (value == 'Да ')
                  || (value == 'Есть')
                  || (value == 'Есть ')
            )}}
            <i class="value__yes"></i>
            {{else}}
            {{if is_url}}
            <a href="${value}" target="_blank">Ссылка</a>
            {{else}}
            {{html value }}
            {{/if}}
            {{/if}}
        </dd>
    </dl>
</script>

<script type="text/x-jquery-tmpl" id="productFeaturesTemplate">

            {{html label }}:
        </dt>
        <dd class="value {{if is_url}}attribute-link{{/if}}">
            {{if ((value == 'Да') || (value == 'Да ') || (value == 'Есть') || (value == 'Есть ')
                  || (value == 'Да')
                  || (value == 'Да ')
                  || (value == 'Есть')
                  || (value == 'Есть ')
            )}}
            <i class="value__yes"></i>
            {{else}}
            {{if is_url}}
            <a href="${value}" target="_blank">Ссылка</a>
            {{else}}
            {{html value }}
            {{/if}}
            {{/if}}
        </dd>
    </dl>
</script>

<!-- Google Tag Manager -->
<script>
    function getLastViewedProducts() {
        var lastViewed = localStorage.getItem('last_viewed_products');
        if (!lastViewed) {
            lastViewed = [];
        } else {
            lastViewed = JSON.parse(lastViewed);
        }
        return lastViewed;
    }

    function getLastViewedProductsForGtm() {
        var lastViewed = getLastViewedProducts();
        if (!lastViewed.length) {
            return 'None';
        }
        var result = '';
        var separator = '|';
        for (var i = 0; i < lastViewed.length; i++) {
            result += (result.length ? separator : '') + lastViewed[i].product_id;
        }

        return result;
    }

    
</script><script id="gtmDataLayer">// возвращает cookie с именем name, если есть, если нет, то undefined
    function getBuyerCookie() {
        var cname = 'buyer';
        var name = cname + "=";
        var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
        for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
            var c = ca[i];
            while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') c = c.substring(1);
            if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
                return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
            }
        }
        return "";
    }
            gtmUserId =  (Mage.Cookies.get('registered_customer')) ? Mage.Cookies.get('registered_customer') : null;
        gtmUserAuth = (gtmUserId) ? 1 : 0;

    <script id="gtmSnippetScript">(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
            new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
            j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=

<script type="text/javascript" id="gtmEvent">
    jQuery(function ($) {
        $('#menu').click('a', function (event) {
            var obj = {
                "getAttribute": function() {return 'Interactions-click-mainMenu'},
                "innerHTML": event.target.innerHTML.trim()
            };
            event.target = obj;
            processGtmEvent(event);
        });
        $(document).on('click', 'a.js-gtm-layer', function (event) {
            event.target = jQuery(this).parents('li')[0];
            processGtmEvent(event);
        });
        $('.row_methods').on('click', '.js-gtm-switch-delivery', function (event) {
            event.target = this;
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm', 'Interactions-switch-deliveryMethod');
            if (!event.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-method')) {
                event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm-method', (this.getAttribute('for').indexOf('pickup') > 1) ? 'pickup' : 'delivery');
            }
            processGtmEvent(event);
        });
        $('.opc-tab-content_payment').on('click', '.js-gtm-switch-payment', function (event) {
            event.target = this;
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm', 'Interactions-switch-paymentMethod');
            var code = this.getAttribute('for');
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm-method', (code.indexOf('Card') > 1) ?
                'card' : ((code.indexOf('Cash') > 1) ? 'cash' : 'credit'));
            processGtmEvent(event);
        });
        $('.lang-list').on('click', '.js-gtm-switch-language', function (event) {
            event.target = this;
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm', 'Interactions-switch-language');
            processGtmEvent(event);
        });
        $('body').on('click', '.js-gtm-add-service', function (event) {
            event.target = this;
            processGtmEvent(event);
        });
        $(document).on('click', 'a.js-product-arrange_delivery', function (event) {
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm', 'Conversions-click-buyWithDelivery');
            processGtmEvent(event);
        });
        $(document).on('click', 'a.js-gtm-chat-open', function (event) {
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm', 'Interactions-open-chat');
            processGtmEvent(event);
        });
        $(document).on('click', 'a.js-gtm-offers-open', function (event) {
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm', 'Interactions-open-specialOffers');
            processGtmEvent(event);
        });
        $(document).on('click', 'li.js-gtm-click-layer-tab', function (event) {
            event.target = this;
            processGtmEvent(event);
        });

        $(document).on('click', '#openCouponForm', function (event) {
            if (event.gtmProcessed == 1) {
                return;
            }
            var gtmString = $(this).data('gtm'),
                gtmData = gtmString.split('-'),
                gtm = {
                'event': 'OWOX',
                'eventCategory': gtmData[0],
                'eventAction': gtmData[1],
                'eventLabel': gtmData[2]
            };

            gtm.eventAction = ($(this).data('gtmStatus') == 'open') ? 'hide' : 'show';
            var formState = ($(this).data('gtmStatus') != 'open') ?
                    'open' : 'closed';
            $(this).data('gtmStatus', formState);
            event.gtmProcessed = 1;
            //alert(JSON.stringify(gtm));
            dataLayer.push(gtm);
        });

        $('.products-tiles').on('click', '.products-tiles__cell', function (event) {
            processProductListGtmEvent(event, this);
        });
        $('#compareList').on('click', '.item_service', function (event) {
            processProductListGtmEvent(event, this);
        });
        $(document).on('click', '.js-gtm-product-cell', function (event) {
            processProductListGtmEvent(event, this);
        });
        if (typeof(window.videoIds) != "undefined") {
            window.onYouTubePlayerReady = function (playerId) {
                for (var i = 0; i < window.videoIds.length; i++) {
                    document.getElementById( "video_" + window.videoIds[i].id).addEventListener("onStateChange", "onGtmPlayerStateChange");
                }
            };

            window.onGtmPlayerStateChange = function (newState) {
                var gtm = getGtmEventForString('Interactions-click-video');
                gtm.eventLocation = 'productPage';
                switch (newState) {
                    case 1:
                        gtm.eventContext = 'play';
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        gtm.eventContext = 'pause';
                        break;
                    case 0:
                        gtm.eventContent = 'end';
                        break;
                    default:
                        return;
                }
                dataLayer.push(gtm);
            };
        }
        $('.banner .control').on('click', 'li', function (event) {
            if (event.target.getAttribute('data-gtm')) {
                return;
            }
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm', 'Interactions-switch-banner');
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm-index', jQuery('#' + this.parentNode.id + ' li').index(this));
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm-context', (this.parentNode.id.indexOf('first') > -1 ? 'first' : (this.parentNode.id.indexOf('second') > -1) ? 'second' : 'third'));
            //processGtmEvent(event);
        });
        $('.js-gtm-services-control').on('click', 'li', function (event) {
            if (event.target.getAttribute('data-gtm')) {
                return;
            }
            event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm', 'Interactions-scroll-servicesList');
        });
        $(document).click(function (event) {
            window.gtmEvent = event;
            if (event.target.id == 'recallLink') {
                event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm', 'Interactions-open-callbackForm');
            }
            if (event.target.getAttribute('data-gtm')) {
                processGtmEvent(event);
            }
        });
        function processGtmEvent(myEvent) {
            if (myEvent.gtmProcessed == 1) {
                return;
            }
            var gtmString = myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm');
            var gtm = getGtmEventForString(gtmString);
            switch (gtmString) {
                case 'Interactions-choose-visitorCity':
                case 'Interactions-click-productsCategory':
                case 'Interactions-click-mainMenu':
                    gtm.eventContent = myEvent.target.innerHTML.trim();
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-open-authorizationForm':
                    gtm.eventLocation = 'header';
                    break;
                case 'Conversions-click-registr':
                    gtm.userPhonelHash = getUserPhoneHash('registration_phone');
                    break;
                case 'Conversions-click-callMe':
                    gtm.userPhonelHash = getUserPhoneHash('buyOneClickPhone');
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-click-signIn':
                    var inputtedString = document.getElementById('login_phone').value;
                    gtm.eventContext = (inputtedString.indexOf('293') == 0 || inputtedString.indexOf('294') == 0)
                        ? 'bonusCard' : 'mobilePhone';
                    if (gtm.eventContext == 'bonusCard') {
                        gtm.bonusCardNumber = inputtedString;
                    } else {
                        gtm.userPhonelHash = md5(inputtedString);
                    }
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-click-search':
                    gtm.eventContext = document.getElementById('searchTop').value;
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-switch-language':
                    gtm.eventContent = jQuery(myEvent.target).text().trim();
                    break;
                // cart section start
                case 'Interactions-remove-cart':
                case 'Interactions-add-cartItemQuantity':
                case 'Interactions-remove-cartItemQuantity':
                    jQuery.extend(gtm, quoteItemsGtmData[myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-item-id')]);
                    gtm.eventLocation = gtmEventLocation;
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-scroll-accessoriesList':
                    gtm.eventLocation = 'cart';
                    break;
                //cart section end
                case 'Conversions-add-cart':
                    var $currentTab = jQuery('.pr-accessories-category .items span.selected:first');
                    var currentTabName = ($currentTab.length > 0) ? $currentTab.text().trim() : 'accessories';
                    gtm.eventContext = myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-context');
                    gtm.eventContent =  (myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-location') && myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-location') != 'accessories') ? myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-location') : currentTabName; // gtm-location set only for services
                    gtm.eventLocation = (myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-location')) ? myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-location') : 'accessories';
                    gtm.eventPosition = myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-position');
                case 'Interactions-remove-wishList':
                case 'Interactions-remove-compare':
                    jQuery.extend(gtm, productDataStringToObject(myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-product')));
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-switch-accessoriesList':
                    gtm.eventContext = 'page';
                    gtm.eventContent = myEvent.target.innerHTML.trim();
                    gtm.eventPosition = myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-position');
                    break;
                case 'Conversions-click-buyButtonCompare':
                    jQuery.extend(gtm, productDataStringToObject(myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-product')));
                    gtm.eventLabel = 'buyButton';
                    gtm.eventLocation = 'comparingList';
                    break;
                // filter section
                case 'Interactions-switch-filterTab':
                    gtm.eventContent = myEvent.target.children[0].children[1].innerHTML.trim();
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-click-filter':
                    gtm.eventLabel = (myEvent.target.className.indexOf('active') > -1) ? 'filterOff' : 'filterOn';
                case 'Interactions-click-filterOff':
                    var filterData = myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-filter').split('-');
                    gtm.eventContext = filterData[0];
                    gtm.eventContent = filterData[1];
                    break;
                // end of filter section
                case 'Interactions-switch-sort':
                    gtm.eventContext = myEvent.target.innerHTML.trim();
                    break;
                // product page section start
                case 'Interactions-show-productDetails':
                    gtm.eventAction = (jQuery('#prFeatures').hasClass('open')) ? 'show' : 'hide';
                case 'Conversions-click-buyWithoutDelivery':
                case 'Conversions-click-buyWithDelivery':
                case 'Conversions-click-fastBuyButton':
                    gtm.eventLocation = 'productPage';
                case 'Conversions-click-buyInCredit':
                    addProductObjectFromEventData(gtm);
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-add-compare':
                    if (jQuery(myEvent.target).hasClass('compare__link_view')) {
                        gtm.eventAction = 'open';
                        gtm.eventLable = 'comparePage';
                        gtm.eventContext = 'link';
                    }
                case 'Conversions-add-wishList':
                case 'Conversions-click-buyButton':
                    gtm.eventLocation = eventData.pageType;
                    addProductObjectFromEventData(gtm);
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-add-review':
                    var recommendation = 'withoutRecommendations';
                    switch (document.forms['review-form'].recommendation.value) {
                        case '1':
                            recommendation = 'recommend';
                            break;
                        case '2':
                            recommendation = 'notRecommend';
                    }
                    gtm.eventContext = recommendation;
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-scroll-servicesList':
                    gtm.eventContext = 'page';
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-switch-productDetailsTab':
                    var gtmTabLabel = myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-tab-label');
                    gtm.eventContent = gtmTabLabel;
                    try {
                        dataLayer[0]['tabePage'] = gtmTabLabel;
                    } catch (e) {
                        console.log(e);
                    }
                    break;
                // end of product page section
                //checkout section start
                case 'Conversions-click-checkout':
                    gtm.userPhonelHash = getUserPhoneHash('pickupPhone', 'deliveryPhone');
                    gtm.userEmailHash = getUserEmailHash('pickupEmail', 'deliveryEmail');
                    break;
                case 'Conversions-click-confirmPromocode':
                    gtm.eventContent = document.getElementById('couponCode').value;
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-show-promocodeForm':
                    gtm.eventAction = (myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-status') == 'open') ? 'hide' : 'show';
                    myEvent.target.setAttribute('data-gtm-status', (myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-status') != 'open') ?
                        'open' : 'closed');
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-switch-paymentMethod':
                case 'Interactions-switch-deliveryMethod':
                    gtm.eventContent = myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-method');
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-click-giftCardOn':
                    gtm.eventLabel = (myEvent.target.className.indexOf('active') > -1) ? 'giftCardOff' : 'giftCardOn';
                    break;
                // end of checkout section
                case 'Conversions-click-attachCard':
                    gtm.eventContext = (document.getElementById('bonusCard3')) ? 'foundCard' : 'newCard';
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-click-banner':
                    var bannerInfo = myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-banner').split('-');
                    gtm.eventContext = 'banner-big-' + bannerInfo[0];
                    gtm.eventPosition = 1 + parseInt(bannerInfo[1], 10);
                    gtm.eventContent = bannersData[bannerInfo[0]][bannerInfo[1]].title;
                    addLocationData(gtm);
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-switch-banner':
                    var index = myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-index');
                    var context = myEvent.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-context');
                    gtm.eventContext = 'banner-big-' + context;
                    gtm.eventPosition = 1 + parseInt(index);
                    gtm.eventContent = bannersData[context][index].title;
                    break;
                case 'Interactions-open-comparePage':
                    gtm.eventContext = 'button';
                    gtm.eventLocation = (eventData.hasOwnProperty('pageType')) ? eventData.pageType : 'catalog';
                    break;
                case 'Conversions-click-buyWithDeliveryPopup':
                case 'Conversions-click-buyWithoutDeliveryPopup':
                    gtm.eventLabel = gtm.eventLabel.replace('Popup', '');
                    gtm.eventLocation = window.gtmEventLocation;
                    jQuery.extend(gtm, window.gtmEventProductData);
                    break;
            };
            myEvent.gtmProcessed = 1;
            dataLayer.push(gtm);
        }
        function processProductListGtmEvent(event, obj) {
            if (event.gtmProcessed == 1) {
                return;
            }
            var $el = jQuery(event.target);
            var gtmEvent = 'Interactions-open-productPage';
            var eventContext = 'title';
            if ($el.prop('tagName') == 'A' && $el.hasClass('js-product-title')) {
                eventContext = 'title';
            } else if ($el.prop('tagName') == 'SPAN' && $el.hasClass('js-more-button')) {
                eventContext = 'button';
            } else if ($el.hasClass('js-gtm-product-video')) {
                eventContext = 'video';
            } else if ($el.hasClass('js-gtm-product-review')) {
                eventContext = 'reviews';
            } else if ($el.prop('tagName') == 'IMG' || ($el.prop('tagName') == 'DIV' && $el.hasClass('js-products-labels'))) {
                eventContext = 'photo';
            } else if ($el.prop('tagName') == 'A' && $el.hasClass('js-item-features')) {
                gtmEvent = (event.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-status') == 'open') ? 'Interactions-hide-productDetails' : 'Interactions-show-productDetails';
                event.target.setAttribute('data-gtm-status', (event.target.getAttribute('data-gtm-status') != 'open') ?
                    'open' : 'closed');
            } else if ($el.prop('tagName') == 'A' && $el.hasClass('compare__link') && $el.hasClass('compare__link_view')) {
                gtmEvent = 'Interactions-open-comparePage';
            } else if ($el.prop('tagName') == 'A' && $el.hasClass('compare__link')) {
                gtmEvent = 'Interactions-add-compare';
            } else if ($el.hasClass('js-gtm-shipping-condition-popup')) {
                gtmEvent = 'Interactions-open-shippingConditionPopup';
                window.gtmEventProductData = productDataStringToObject(obj.getAttribute('data-gtm-product'));
            } else {
                return;
            }
            var gtm = getGtmEventForString(gtmEvent);
            if (gtmEvent == 'Interactions-open-productPage') {
                gtm.eventContext = eventContext;
                addLocationData(gtm);
            }
            gtm.eventLocation = (obj.getAttribute('data-gtm-location') == 'catalog' && eventData.pageType == 'SearchResult') ? 'searchResults' : obj.getAttribute('data-gtm-location');
            if ($el.hasClass('Interactions-open-shippingConditionPopup')) {
                window.gtmEventLocation = gtm.eventLocation;
            }
            if (gtmEvent != 'Interactions-open-comparePage' && gtmEvent != 'Interactions-open-shippingConditionPopup') {
                gtm.eventPosition = parseInt(obj.getAttribute('data-gtm-position'), 10) + 1;
                jQuery.extend(gtm, productDataStringToObject(obj.getAttribute('data-gtm-product')));
            }
            if (gtmEvent == 'Interactions-open-comparePage') {
                gtm.eventContext = 'link';
            }
            dataLayer.push(gtm);
            event.gtmProcessed = 1;
        }
        function getGtmEventForString(gtmString) {
            var gtmData = gtmString.split('-');
            return {
                'event': 'OWOX',
                'eventCategory': gtmData[0],
                'eventAction': gtmData[1],
                'eventLabel': gtmData[2]
            };
        }
        function addProductObjectFromEventData(gtm) {
            gtm.eventProductId = eventData.productId;
            gtm.eventProductName = eventData.productName;
            gtm.eventCategoryId = eventData.categoryId;
            gtm.eventCategoryName = eventData.categoryName;
            gtm.eventCategoryGroupId = eventData.categoryGroupId;
            gtm.eventCategoryGroupName = eventData.categoryGroupName;
            gtm.eventPortalId = eventData.portalId;
            gtm.eventPortalName = eventData.portalName;
            gtm.eventVendorId = eventData.vendorId;
            gtm.eventVendorName = eventData.vendorName;
            gtm.eventProductPrice = eventData.productPrice;
            gtm.eventProductTag = eventData.productTag;
            return gtm;
        }
        function addLocationData(gtm) {
            gtm.pageURL = document.location.href;
            gtm.pageTitle = document.title;
            return gtm;
        }
        function productDataStringToObject(string) {
            return jQuery.parseJSON(string.replace(/'/ig, '\"'));
        }
        function getUserPhoneHash(phoneElId, deliveryPhoneElId) {
            var phone = document.getElementById(phoneElId),
                deliveryPhone = document.getElementById(deliveryPhoneElId);

            return phone ? md5(phone.value.replace(/\D/g, '')) : md5(deliveryPhone.value.replace(/\D/g, ''));
        }
        function getUserEmailHash(emailElId, deliveryEmailElId) {
            var email = document.getElementById(emailElId),
                deliveryEmail = document.getElementById(deliveryEmailElId);

            return email ? md5(email.value) : md5(deliveryEmail.value);
        }
    });
</script>
<!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
